summary: Sinbad and his shipmates aid a young prince, who must battle an evil wizard to gain the hand of a beautiful princess.
cast: Lou Ferrigno|John Steiner|Roland Wybenga|Ennio Girolami|Hal Yamanouchi|Yehuda Efroni|Alessandra Martines|Teagan Clive|Leo Gullotta|Stefania Girolami Goodwin|Donald Hodson|Melonee Rodgers|Cork Hubbert|Romano Puppo|Attilio Cesare Lo Pinto|Armando MacRory|Giada Cozzi|Daria Nicolodi|Ted Rusoff|Massimo Vanni
keywords: rescue|seduction|hand to hand combat|threatened with a knife|doppelganger
director: Directors: Enzo G. Castellari, Luigi Cozzi (uncredited)
title: Simbad, el rey de los mares
